title: White House calls on Fox News to apologize after top host’s ‘sickening’ Islamophobic rant | CNN Business
summary: Fox News is under fire for remaining silent after its host, Jesse Watters, made Islamophobic comments on "The Five." Watters expressed his frustration with Arab Americans and the entire Muslim world, sparking outrage and a rebuke from the White House. This incident highlights Fox News' willingness to broadcast hateful rhetoric, contributing to a charged environment of bigotry and intolerance.
